price: ኀጢአትን መሓሪ፣ ጸጸትንም ተቀባይ፣ ቅጣተ ብርቱ፣ የልግስና ባለቤት ከኾነው (አላህ የወረደ ነው)፡፡ ከእርሱ በቀር አምላክ የለም፡፡ መመለሻው ወደርሱ ብቻ ነው፡፡
arabic: غَافِرِ ٱلذَّنۢبِ وَقَابِلِ ٱلتَّوۡبِ شَدِيدِ ٱلۡعِقَابِ ذِي ٱلطَّوۡلِۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ghāfiri al-dhanbi waqābili al-tawbi shadīdi al-ʿiqābi dhī al-ṭawli lā ilāha illā huwa ilayhi al-maṣīru
